Defines

#define XWDTPS_HW_H

Register Map

Offsets of registers from the start of the device



#define XWDTPS_ZMR_OFFSET   0x0
#define XWDTPS_CCR_OFFSET   0x4
#define XWDTPS_RESTART_OFFSET   0x8
#define XWDTPS_SR_OFFSET   0xC
Zero Mode Register

This register controls how the time out is indicated and also contains the access code (0xABC) to allow writes to the register



#define XWDTPS_ZMR_WDEN_MASK   0x00000001
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_RSTEN_MASK   0x00000002
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_IRQEN_MASK   0x00000004
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_RSTLN_MASK   0x00000070
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_RSTLN_SHIFT   4
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_IRQLN_MASK   0x00000180
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_IRQLN_SHIFT   7
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_ZKEY_MASK   0x00FFF000
#define XWDTPS_ZMR_ZKEY_VAL   0x00ABC000
Counter Control register

This register controls how fast the timer runs and the reset value and also contains the access code (0x248) to allow writes to the register



#define XWDTPS_CCR_CLKSEL_MASK   0x00000003
#define XWDTPS_CCR_CRV_MASK   0x00003FFC
#define XWDTPS_CCR_CRV_SHIFT   2
#define XWDTPS_CCR_CKEY_MASK   0x03FFC000
#define XWDTPS_CCR_CKEY_VAL   0x00920000
#define XWDTPS_CCR_PSCALE_0008   0x00000000
#define XWDTPS_CCR_PSCALE_0064   0x00000001
#define XWDTPS_CCR_PSCALE_0512   0x00000002
#define XWDTPS_CCR_PSCALE_4096   0x00000003
Restart register

This register resets the timer preventing a timeout. Value is specific 0x1999



#define XWDTPS_RESTART_KEY_VAL   0x00001999
Status register

This register indicates timer reached zero count.



#define XWDTPS_SR_WDZ_MASK   0x00000001

Detailed Description

This file contains the hardware interface to the System Watch Dog Timer (WDT).

 MODIFICATION HISTORY:
 Ver   Who    Date     Changes
 ----- ------ -------- ---------------------------------------------
 1.00a ecm/jz 01/15/10 First release
 1.02a  sg    07/15/12 Removed defines related to  External Signal
			Length functionality for CR 658287

Define Documentation

#define XWDTPS_CCR_CKEY_MASK   0x03FFC000

mask for writing access key

#define XWDTPS_CCR_CKEY_VAL   0x00920000

access key, 0x248 << 14

#define XWDTPS_CCR_CLKSEL_MASK   0x00000003

counter clock prescale

#define XWDTPS_CCR_CRV_MASK   0x00003FFC

counter reset value

#define XWDTPS_CCR_CRV_SHIFT   2

shift for writing value

#define XWDTPS_CCR_OFFSET   0x4

Counter Control Register

#define XWDTPS_CCR_PSCALE_0008   0x00000000

divide clock by 8

divide clock by 64

#define XWDTPS_CCR_PSCALE_0512   0x00000002

divide clock by 512

#define XWDTPS_CCR_PSCALE_4096   0x00000003

divide clock by 4096

Parameters:

RegOffset is the register offset to be read
Returns:
The 32-bit value of the register

Parameters:
